summary: This document is an email chain between an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) in the Southern District of New York and an unidentified recipient regarding the completion of a photo sourcing project for trial preparation. The email includes an attached spreadsheet with photos, evidence item numbers, CD names, and location information.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified as an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York, is following up on a photo sourcing project for trial preparation.

events.title: Follow-up on Photo Sourcing Project
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email checking on the status of a photo sourcing project for trial preparation.

events.title: Completion of Photo Sourcing Project
events.description: An email is sent confirming the completion of the photo sourcing project, with an attached spreadsheet containing photos, evidence item numbers, CD names, and location information.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain related to trial preparation in the Epstein case, specifically concerning a photo sourcing project.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is involved in coordinating the project.
A completed spreadsheet was attached to the email, containing photos with evidence item numbers, CD names, and location information.
The email indicates ongoing legal preparation work as of September 2021.
The correspondence is marked as external email, suggesting communication outside the immediate prosecution team.
